entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 15 except 7 near Lake Erie.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
